name: Sudogo
description:
This project replaces Kodumaro Sudoku.

Github: https://github.com/cacilhas/sudogo

Keys:

  • F1: help
  • ESC: back / exit
  • Arrow keys / WASD / HJKL: move
  • Numerical keys: toggle candidate
  • Shift + numerical keys: set cell value (0 to unset)

Only GNU/Linux for now.
